newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Videocon Intl mandates $70 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: Videocon Intl mandates $70 mln FRN.

text.p: Videocon International has mandated Peregrine Fixed Income to arrange a seven-year US$70 million floating rate note issue, the arranger said.
The issue is the borrower's first FRN.
The issue will be launched with an indicated price range rather than with a set spread. Pricing will be determined based on investor demand after the reply deadline.
The indicated range has not yet been decided but the notes are expected to pay a coupon of more than 200 basis points over the London Interbank Offered Rate.
Roadshows will be held in Tokyo on Monday, October 14 and later that week in Seoul, Hong Kong and Singapore. There also will be presentations in Middle East and European cities.
